img.title: The Doppler effect is a mysterious wavelength-shifting phenomenon which seems to primarily affect sirens, which is why the üö® emoji is red.

item.title: TheOatmeal: Terrible things are going down

img.title: The creepy fingers that grow from a vibrating cornstarch-water mix can be modeled as a chain of inverted vertical pendulums (DOI:10.1039/c4sm00265b) and are believed to be the fingers of Maxwell's Demon trying to push through into our universe.
img.alt: The creepy fingers that grow from a vibrating cornstarch-water mix can be modeled as a chain of inverted vertical pendulums (DOI:10.1039/c4sm00265b) and are believed to be the fingers of Maxwell's Demon trying to push through into our universe.

item.title: LovingReaper: Funeral
item.description:
Did you know that crows hold "funerals" for their dead?
By the way: Boris is real and lives with John in the Netherlands. John found him badly injured and unable to fly, he would be lost in the wild. John has been looking after Boris for years and lets him out into the wild (under guard) as often as possible. John also works with Boris to educate people about crows and wildlife. Amazing Team!

item.title: PixieAndBrutus: Memory
item.description: Minnesota is known as "The Land of Ten Thousand Lakes" but actually we have closer to fourteen thousand that are 10 acres or larger.

item.title: LovingReaper: Sit with us?
item.description: Would you have him deliver a message? Would you trust him with that?

item.title: LovingReaper: Dear Trixi
item.description: My best friend died. As you may have noticed, my dog lost her battle against her tumor last month. The dog that inspired so many of my comics and was always by my side. This is the most painful piece, but it was therapeutic in a way to say goodbye to Trixi in this way. Goodbye my "curly banana", you were loved so so much...

item.title: LovingReaper: Follow me
item.description: I have not only a little Christmas story for you, but also a continuation of "Black Cats". Because I don't want to leave you sad for the holidays, you'll get to know Reaper's secret little helper. Even the cold can harbor so much goodness. Wish you a wonderful time :)

item.title: LovingReaper: Pumkin time
item.description: I had a quick idea for a bittersweet Halloween comic. Please pay close attention to where your cats hide outside when it is cold ‚ù§ Happy Halloween! ÔøΩÔøΩ

item.title: LovingReaper: Sing - *small update*
item.description: (Please excuse that this month was a bit quiet, I was really ill and my body was at it's end üòû but it's getting better and I'll go back to creating comics very soon!)

ALSO, Loving Reaper is part of webtoon's official merch campain! You can check it out at https://shopwebtoon.com/

item.title: LovingReaper: Wait!
item.description: Really not my best work.... but I wanted to upload it anyway because the topic is very important and I'm tired of reading about these avoidable tragedies every year. EVERY. DAMN. YEAR.

item.title: LovingReaper: It will change
item.description: I read some really sad facts a while ago, a lot of animals are having a really hard time because of this. What are your thoughts on this?
